title: 248-Sorcerer's Apprentice: The Magic Words
itunes:title: 248-Sorcerer's Apprentice: The Magic Words
description:
Two stories of sorcerer's apprentices. The first picks the wrong major at wizard school. The second finds a creative way into school...by becoming a dangerous sorcerer's BFF.

The creatures are the elle maids, definitely not suspicious women offering wine to strangers on the road.
